li.label: Goat face
li.description: This isn't what I was planning to wake up to this morning...

li.label: Goat face
li.description: Maaah! I want to ram something!

li.label: Goat face
li.description: My face...what's wrong with my face!?

li.label: Goat ears
li.description: At least I can hear a bit better...

li.label: Goat ears
li.description: I can hear echoes so well now!

li.label: Goat ears
li.description: If anyone mentions the story about the goats and that bridge, they're a dead man!

li.label: Goat tail
li.description: What? What tail? I can't see it!

li.label: Goat tail
li.description: At least I can hide it...
